sentences.en: Amy went and kissed him, and then danced out of his reach.
sentences.cn: 埃米过去吻了他一下，接着就从他怀里跳开了。

sentences.en: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.cn: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

sentences.en: Girls generally reach sexual maturity two years earlier than boys.
sentences.cn: 通常女孩性发育成熟要比男孩早两年。

sentences.en: He managed to reach a partial agreement with both republics.
sentences.cn: 他设法与两个共和国都达成了部分协议。

sentences.en: He recovered from a 4-2 deficit to reach the quarter-finals.
sentences.cn: 他在2比4落后的情况下实现逆转闯进1/4决赛。

sentences.en: I got a message you were trying to reach me.
sentences.cn: 我收到一条留言，说你想跟我联系。

sentences.en: I moved on round the big house to reach my pad.
sentences.cn: 我绕过大房子走向我的公寓。

sentences.en: I tried to reach the foot brakes but I couldn't.
sentences.cn: 我试图去够脚刹，但是没能踩到。

sentences.en: Isabelle placed a wine cup on the table within his reach.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔把酒杯放在桌上他伸手可及的地方。

sentences.en: It had taken Masters about twenty hours to reach the house.
sentences.cn: 马斯特斯用了约20个钟头才到达那所房子。

sentences.en: It is located within reach of many important Norman towns, including Bayeux.
sentences.cn: 它邻近许多重要的诺曼城镇，包括贝叶。

sentences.en: It would be a disaster for them not to reach the semi-finals.
sentences.cn: 如果不能挺进半决赛，对他们来说就是完败。

sentences.en: Keep breakables out of reach of very young children.
sentences.cn: 把易碎物品放在小孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.en: Negotiators again worked right down to the wire to reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 谈判人员又是直到最后时刻才达成了协议。

sentences.en: She reached into her bag and produced a business card.
sentences.cn: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.en: They are meeting in Lusaka in an attempt to reach a compromise.
sentences.cn: 他们在卢萨卡举行会谈试图达成妥协。

sentences.en: Turkeys can reach enormous weights of up to 50 pounds.
We reached London late at night.
中文例句：The talks will continue until a conclusion is reached.
sentences.cn: 会谈将一直进行下去，直到得出结论.

words.tran_cn: 范围；延伸；河段；横风行驶

phrases.tran_cn: 力所不及；无法达到；超出…的能力之外
无法达到；超出…的能力之外
超出某人双手的所及范围
得出结论；达成一个结论
达成协议；取得一致意见，达成共识
在某人双手的所及范围之内；够得着

trans.tran_cn: 臂展，影响范围，河段，边远地区，领域
trans.tran_en: the limit of someone’s power or ability to do something

trans.tran_cn: 到达，实现，达到，引起注意，伸手，够得着，联系
trans.tran_en: if someone or something reaches a particular point in their development or in a process or competition, they get to that point
